titleStmt.title: A letter to the parishioners of St. B.--- A.--- [St. Botolph Aldgate] shewing the use and necessity of paying Easter-offerings, now restored to the parish minister.
titleStmt.author: Brewster, Samuel, fl. 1700-1725.

notesStmt.note: Signed: S.B. [i.e., S. Brewster]. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
